name: Bulbasaur
flavorText: Bulbasaur can be seen napping in bright sunlight. There is a seed on its back. By soaking up the sun’s rays, the seed grows progressively larger.

abilities.name: Overgrow
abilities.flavorText: Powers up Grass-type moves when the Pokémon’s HP is low.
abilities.shortEffect: Strengthens grass moves to inflict 1.5× damage at 1/3 max HP or less.
effect: When this Pokémon has 1/3 or less of its HP remaining, its grass-type moves inflict 1.5× as much regular damage.

abilities.name: Chlorophyll
abilities.flavorText: Boosts the Pokémon’s Speed stat in harsh sunlight.
abilities.shortEffect: Doubles Speed during strong sunlight.
effect: This Pokémon's Speed is doubled during strong sunlight.
This bonus does not count as a stat modifier.

1.name: Tackle
1.flavorText: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.
1.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

1.name: Growl
1.flavorText: The user growls in an endearing way, making opposing Pokémon less wary. This lowers their Attack stat.
1.effect: Lowers the target's Attack by one stage.

1.name: Leech Seed
1.flavorText: A seed is planted on the target. It steals some HP from the target every turn.
1.effect: Seeds the target, stealing HP from it every turn.

1.name: Vine Whip
1.flavorText: The target is struck with slender, whiplike vines to inflict damage.
1.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

1.name: Sleep Powder
1.flavorText: The user scatters a big cloud of sleep-inducing dust around the target.
1.effect: Puts the target to sleep.

1.name: Poison Powder
1.flavorText: The user scatters a cloud of poisonous dust that poisons the target.
1.effect: Poisons the target.

1.name: Take Down
1.flavorText: A reckless, full-body charge attack for slamming into the target. This also damages the user a little.
1.effect: User receives 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil.

1.name: Razor Leaf
1.flavorText: Sharp-edged leaves are launched to slash at the opposing Pokémon. Critical hits land more easily.
1.effect: Has an increased chance for a critical hit.

1.name: Sweet Scent
1.effect: Lowers the target's evasion by one stage.

1.name: Growth
1.flavorText: The user’s body grows all at once, raising the Attack and Sp. Atk stats.
1.effect: Raises the user's Attack and Special Attack by one stage.

1.name: Double-Edge
1.flavorText: A reckless, life-risking tackle. This also damages the user quite a lot.
1.effect: User receives 1/3 the damage inflicted in recoil.

1.name: Worry Seed
1.effect: Changes the target's ability to Insomnia.

1.name: Synthesis
1.effect: Heals the user by half its max HP.  Affected by weather.

1.name: Seed Bomb
1.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

name: Ivysaur
flavorText: There is a bud on this Pokémon’s back. To support its weight, Ivysaur’s legs and trunk grow thick and strong. If it starts spending more time lying in the sunlight, it’s a sign that the bud will bloom into a large flower soon.

abilities.flavorText: Powers up Grass-type moves when the Pokémon’s HP is low.
abilities.shortEffect: Strengthens grass moves to inflict 1.5× damage at 1/3 max HP or less.
effect: When this Pokémon has 1/3 or less of its HP remaining, its grass-type moves inflict 1.5× as much regular damage.

abilities.shortEffect: Doubles Speed during strong sunlight.

This bonus does not count as a stat modifier.

1.effect: Heals the user by half its max HP.  Affected by weather.

1.name: Solar Beam
1.flavorText: In this two-turn attack, the user gathers light, then blasts a bundled beam on the next turn.
1.effect: Requires a turn to charge before attacking.

name: Venusaur
flavorText: There is a large flower on Venusaur’s back. The flower is said to take on vivid colors if it gets plenty of nutrition and sunlight. The flower’s aroma soothes the emotions of people.

abilities.flavorText: Powers up Grass-type moves when the Pokémon’s HP is low.
abilities.shortEffect: Strengthens grass moves to inflict 1.5× damage at 1/3 max HP or less.
effect: When this Pokémon has 1/3 or less of its HP remaining, its grass-type moves inflict 1.5× as much regular damage.

abilities.shortEffect: Doubles Speed during strong sunlight.
effect: This Pokémon's Speed is doubled during strong sunlight.
This bonus does not count as a stat modifier.

1.name: Petal Dance
1.flavorText: The user attacks the target by scattering petals for two to three turns. The user then becomes confused.
1.effect: Hits every turn for 2-3 turns, then confuses the user.

1.name: Leech Seed
1.flavorText: A seed is planted on the target. It steals some HP from the target every turn.
1.effect: Seeds the target, stealing HP from it every turn.

1.name: Vine Whip

1.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

1.name: Petal Blizzard
1.effect: Inflicts regular damage.

1.name: Solar Beam
1.flavorText: In this two-turn attack, the user gathers light, then blasts a bundled beam on the next turn.
1.effect: Requires a turn to charge before attacking.

name: Charmander
flavorText: The flame that burns at the tip of its tail is an indication of its emotions. The flame wavers when Charmander is enjoying itself. If the Pokémon becomes enraged, the flame burns fiercely.

abilities.name: Blaze
abilities.flavorText: Powers up Fire-type moves when the Pokémon’s HP is low.
abilities.shortEffect: Strengthens fire moves to inflict 1.5× damage at 1/3 max HP or less.
effect: When this Pokémon has 1/3 or less of its HP remaining, its fire-type moves inflict 1.5× as much regular damage.

abilities.name: Solar Power
abilities.flavorText: Boosts the Sp. Atk stat in harsh sunlight, but HP decreases every turn.
abilities.shortEffect: Increases Special Attack to 1.5× but costs 1/8 max HP after each turn during strong sunlight.
effect: During strong sunlight, this Pokémon has 1.5× its Special Attack but takes 1/8 of its maximum HP in damage after each turn.

1.name: Scratch
1.flavorText: Hard, pointed, sharp claws rake the target to inflict damage.
1.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

1.name: Growl
1.flavorText: The user growls in an endearing way, making opposing Pokémon less wary. This lowers their Attack stat.
1.effect: Lowers the target's Attack by one stage.

1.name: Ember
1.flavorText: The target is attacked with small flames. This may also leave the target with a burn.
1.effect: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.

1.name: Smokescreen
1.flavorText: The user releases an obscuring cloud of smoke or ink. This lowers the target’s accuracy.
1.effect: Lowers the target's accuracy by one stage.

1.name: Dragon Rage
1.flavorText: This attack hits the target with a shock wave of pure rage. This attack always inflicts 40 HP damage.
1.effect: Inflicts 40 points of damage.

1.name: Scary Face
1.flavorText: The user frightens the target with a scary face to harshly lower its Speed stat.
1.effect: Lowers the target's Speed by two stages.

1.name: Fire Fang
1.effect: Has a 10% chance to burn the target and a $effect_chance% chance to make the target flinch.

1.name: Flame Burst
1.effect: Deals splash damage to Pokémon next to the target.

1.name: Slash
1.flavorText: The target is attacked with a slash of claws or blades. Critical hits land more easily.
1.effect: Has an increased chance for a critical hit.

1.name: Flamethrower
1.flavorText: The target is scorched with an intense blast of fire. This may also leave the target with a burn.
1.effect: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.

1.name: Fire Spin
1.flavorText: The target becomes trapped within a fierce vortex of fire that rages for four to five turns.
1.effect: Prevents the target from fleeing and inflicts damage for 2-5 turns.

1.name: Inferno
1.effect: Has a 100% chance to burn the target.

name: Charmeleon
flavorText: Charmeleon mercilessly destroys its foes using its sharp claws. If it encounters a strong foe, it turns aggressive. In this excited state, the flame at the tip of its tail flares with a bluish white color.

name: Charizard
flavorText: Charizard flies around the sky in search of powerful opponents. It breathes fire of such great heat that it melts anything. However, it never turns its fiery breath on any opponent weaker than itself.

1.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

name: Squirtle
flavorText: Squirtle’s shell is not merely used for protection. The shell’s rounded shape and the grooves on its surface help minimize resistance in water, enabling this Pokémon to swim at high speeds.

abilities.name: Torrent
abilities.flavorText: Powers up Water-type moves when the Pokémon’s HP is low.
abilities.shortEffect: Strengthens water moves to inflict 1.5× damage at 1/3 max HP or less.
effect: When this Pokémon has 1/3 or less of its HP remaining, its water-type moves inflict 1.5× as much regular damage.

abilities.name: Rain Dish
abilities.flavorText: The Pokémon gradually regains HP in rain.
abilities.shortEffect: Heals for 1/16 max HP after each turn during rain.
effect: This Pokémon heals for 1/16 of its maximum HP after each turn during rain.

1.name: Tackle
1.flavorText: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.
1.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

1.name: Tail Whip
1.flavorText: The user wags its tail cutely, making opposing Pokémon less wary and lowering their Defense stat.
1.effect: Lowers the target's Defense by one stage.

1.name: Water Gun
1.flavorText: The target is blasted with a forceful shot of water.
1.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

1.name: Withdraw
1.flavorText: The user withdraws its body into its hard shell, raising its Defense stat.
1.effect: Raises the user's Defense by one stage.

1.name: Bubble
1.flavorText: A spray of countless bubbles is jetted at the opposing Pokémon. This may also lower their Speed stat.
1.effect: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Speed by one stage.

1.name: Bite
1.flavorText: The target is bitten with viciously sharp fangs. This may also make the target flinch.
1.effect: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

1.name: Rapid Spin
1.effect: Frees the user from binding moves, removes Leech Seed, and blows away Spikes.

1.name: Protect
1.flavorText: Enables the user to evade all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.
1.effect: Prevents any moves from hitting the user this turn.

1.name: Water Pulse
1.effect: Has a 20% chance to confuse the target.

1.name: Aqua Tail
1.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

1.name: Skull Bash
1.flavorText: The user tucks in its head to raise its Defense stat on the first turn, then rams the target on the next turn.
1.effect: Raises the user's Defense by one stage.  User charges for one turn before attacking.

1.name: Iron Defense
1.effect: Raises the user's Defense by two stages.

1.name: Rain Dance
1.effect: Changes the weather to rain for five turns.

1.name: Hydro Pump
1.flavorText: The target is blasted by a huge volume of water launched under great pressure.
1.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

name: Wartortle
flavorText: Its tail is large and covered with a rich, thick fur. The tail becomes increasingly deeper in color as Wartortle ages. The scratches on its shell are evidence of this Pokémon’s toughness as a battler.

name: Blastoise
flavorText: Blastoise has water spouts that protrude from its shell. The water spouts are very accurate. They can shoot bullets of water with enough accuracy to strike empty cans from a distance of over 160 feet.

1.name: Bite
1.flavorText: The target is bitten with viciously sharp fangs. This may also make the target flinch.
1.effect: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

1.name: Rapid Spin
1.effect: Frees the user from binding moves, removes Leech Seed, and blows away Spikes.

1.name: Protect
1.flavorText: Enables the user to evade all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.
1.effect: Prevents any moves from hitting the user this turn.

1.name: Water Pulse
1.effect: Has a 20% chance to confuse the target.

1.name: Aqua Tail
1.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

1.name: Skull Bash
1.flavorText: The user tucks in its head to raise its Defense stat on the first turn, then rams the target on the next turn.
1.effect: Raises the user's Defense by one stage.  User charges for one turn before attacking.

1.name: Iron Defense
1.effect: Raises the user's Defense by two stages.

1.name: Rain Dance
1.effect: Changes the weather to rain for five turns.

1.name: Hydro Pump
1.flavorText: The target is blasted by a huge volume of water launched under great pressure.
1.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

name: Caterpie
flavorText: Perhaps because it would like to grow up quickly, it has a voracious appetite, eating a hundred leaves a day.

abilities.name: Shield Dust
abilities.flavorText: This Pokémon’s dust blocks the additional effects of attacks taken.
abilities.shortEffect: Protects against incoming moves' extra effects.
effect: This Pokémon is immune to the extra effects of moves used against it.

An extra effect is a move's chance, listed as an "effect chance", to inflict a status ailment, cause a stat change, or make the target flinch in addition to the move's main effect.  For example, thunder-shock's paralysis is an extra effect, but thunder-wave's is not, nor are knock-off's item removal and air-cutter's increased critical hit rate.

abilities.name: Run Away
abilities.flavorText: Enables a sure getaway from wild Pokémon.
abilities.shortEffect: Ensures success fleeing from wild battles.
effect: This Pokémon is always successful fleeing from wild battles, even if trapped by a move or ability.

1.name: Tackle
1.flavorText: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.
1.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

1.name: String Shot
1.flavorText: The opposing Pokémon are bound with silk blown from the user’s mouth that harshly lowers the Speed stat.
1.effect: Lowers the target's Speed by two stages.

1.name: Bug Bite
1.effect: If target has a berry, inflicts double damage and uses the berry.

name: Metapod
flavorText: Its shell is filled with a thick liquid. All of the cells throughout its body are being rebuilt in preparation for evolution.

abilities.name: Shed Skin
abilities.flavorText: The Pokémon may heal its own status conditions by shedding its skin.
abilities.shortEffect: Has a 33% chance of curing any major status ailment after each turn.
effect: After each turn, this Pokémon has a 33% of being cured of any major status ailment.

1.name: Harden
1.flavorText: The user stiffens all the muscles in its body to raise its Defense stat.
1.effect: Raises the user's Defense by one stage.

1.name: Harden
1.flavorText: The user stiffens all the muscles in its body to raise its Defense stat.
1.effect: Raises the user's Defense by one stage.

name: Butterfree
flavorText: Its wings are covered in toxic scales. If it finds bird Pokémon going after Caterpie, Butterfree sprinkles its scales on them to drive them off.

abilities.name: Compound Eyes
abilities.flavorText: The Pokémon’s compound eyes boost its accuracy.
abilities.shortEffect: Increases moves' accuracy to 1.3×.
effect: This Pokémon's moves have 1.3× their accuracy.
This ability has no effect on the one-hit KO moves (fissure, guillotine, horn-drill, and sheer-cold).
Overworld: If the first Pokémon in the party has this ability, the chance of a wild Pokémon holding a particular item is raised from 50%, 5%, or 1% to 60%, 20%, or 5%, respectively.

abilities.name: Tinted Lens
abilities.flavorText: The Pokémon can use “not very effective” moves to deal regular damage.
abilities.shortEffect: Doubles damage inflicted with not-very-effective moves.
effect: This Pokémon deals twice as much damage with moves that are not very effective against the target.

1.name: Gust
1.flavorText: A gust of wind is whipped up by wings and launched at the target to inflict damage.
1.effect: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Pokémon in the air.

1.name: Gust
1.flavorText: A gust of wind is whipped up by wings and launched at the target to inflict damage.
1.effect: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Pokémon in the air.

1.name: Confusion
1.flavorText: The target is hit by a weak telekinetic force. This may also confuse the target.
1.effect: Has a 10% chance to confuse the target.

1.name: Confusion
1.flavorText: The target is hit by a weak telekinetic force. This may also confuse the target.
1.effect: Has a 10% chance to confuse the target.

1.name: Stun Spore
1.flavorText: The user scatters a cloud of numbing powder that paralyzes the target.
1.effect: Paralyzes the target.

1.name: Sleep Powder
1.flavorText: The user scatters a big cloud of sleep-inducing dust around the target.
1.effect: Puts the target to sleep.

1.name: Poison Powder
1.flavorText: The user scatters a cloud of poisonous dust that poisons the target.
1.effect: Poisons the target.

1.name: Psybeam
1.flavorText: The target is attacked with a peculiar ray. This may also leave the target confused.
1.effect: Has a 10% chance to confuse the target.

1.name: Silver Wind
1.effect: Has a 10% chance to raise all of the user's stats by one stage.

1.name: Supersonic
1.flavorText: The user generates odd sound waves from its body that confuse the target.
1.effect: Confuses the target.

1.name: Safeguard
1.effect: Protects the user's field from major status ailments and confusion for five turns.

1.name: Whirlwind
1.flavorText: The target is blown away, and a different Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single Pokémon.
1.effect: Immediately ends wild battles.  Forces trainers to switch Pokémon.

1.name: Bug Buzz
1.effect: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by one stage.

1.name: Rage Powder
1.effect: Redirects the target's single-target effects to the user for this turn.

1.name: Captivate
1.effect: Lowers the target's Special Attack by two stages if it's the opposite gender.

1.name: Tailwind
1.effect: For three turns, friendly Pokémon have doubled Speed.

1.name: Air Slash
1.effect: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

1.name: Quiver Dance
1.effect: Raises the user's Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by one stage each.

name: Weedle
flavorText: Weedle has an extremely acute sense of smell. It is capable of distinguishing its favorite kinds of leaves from those it dislikes just by sniffing with its big red proboscis (nose).

abilities.name: Shield Dust
abilities.flavorText: This Pokémon’s dust blocks the additional effects of attacks taken.
abilities.shortEffect: Protects against incoming moves' extra effects.
effect: This Pokémon is immune to the extra effects of moves used against it.

An extra effect is a move's chance, listed as an "effect chance", to inflict a status ailment, cause a stat change, or make the target flinch in addition to the move's main effect.  For example, thunder-shock's paralysis is an extra effect, but thunder-wave's is not, nor are knock-off's item removal and air-cutter's increased critical hit rate.

abilities.name: Run Away
abilities.flavorText: Enables a sure getaway from wild Pokémon.
abilities.shortEffect: Ensures success fleeing from wild battles.
effect: This Pokémon is always successful fleeing from wild battles, even if trapped by a move or ability.

1.name: Poison Sting
1.flavorText: The user stabs the target with a poisonous stinger. This may also poison the target.
1.effect: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.

1.name: String Shot
1.flavorText: The opposing Pokémon are bound with silk blown from the user’s mouth that harshly lowers the Speed stat.
1.effect: Lowers the target's Speed by two stages.

1.name: Bug Bite
1.effect: If target has a berry, inflicts double damage and uses the berry.

name: Kakuna
flavorText: Kakuna remains virtually immobile as it clings to a tree. However, on the inside, it is extremely busy as it prepares for its coming evolution. This is evident from how hot the shell becomes to the touch.

abilities.name: Shed Skin
abilities.flavorText: The Pokémon may heal its own status conditions by shedding its skin.
abilities.shortEffect: Has a 33% chance of curing any major status ailment after each turn.
effect: After each turn, this Pokémon has a 33% of being cured of any major status ailment.

1.name: Harden
1.flavorText: The user stiffens all the muscles in its body to raise its Defense stat.
1.effect: Raises the user's Defense by one stage.

1.name: Harden
1.flavorText: The user stiffens all the muscles in its body to raise its Defense stat.
1.effect: Raises the user's Defense by one stage.

name: Beedrill
flavorText: Beedrill is extremely territorial. No one should ever approach its nest—this is for their own safety. If angered, they will attack in a furious swarm.

abilities.name: Swarm
abilities.flavorText: Powers up Bug-type moves when the Pokémon’s HP is low.
abilities.shortEffect: Strengthens bug moves to inflict 1.5× damage at 1/3 max HP or less.
effect: When this Pokémon has 1/3 or less of its HP remaining, its bug-type moves inflict 1.5× as much regular damage.
Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, the wild encounter rate is increased.

abilities.name: Sniper
abilities.flavorText: Powers up moves if they become critical hits when attacking.
abilities.shortEffect: Strengthens critical hits to inflict 3× damage rather than 2×.
effect: This Pokémon inflicts triple damage with critical hits, rather than the usual double damage.

1.name: Twineedle
1.flavorText: The user damages the target twice in succession by jabbing it with two spikes. This may also poison the target.
1.effect: Hits twice in the same turn.  Has a 20% chance to poison the target.

1.name: Fury Attack
1.flavorText: The target is jabbed repeatedly with a horn or beak two to five times in a row.
1.effect: Hits 2-5 times in one turn.

1.name: Twineedle
1.flavorText: The user damages the target twice in succession by jabbing it with two spikes. This may also poison the target.
1.effect: Hits twice in the same turn.  Has a 20% chance to poison the target.

1.name: Fury Attack
1.flavorText: The target is jabbed repeatedly with a horn or beak two to five times in a row.
1.effect: Hits 2-5 times in one turn.

1.name: Rage
1.flavorText: As long as this move is in use, the power of rage raises the Attack stat each time the user is hit in battle.
1.effect: If the user is hit after using this move, its Attack rises by one stage.

1.name: Pursuit
1.effect: Has double power against, and can hit, Pokémon attempting to switch out.

1.name: Focus Energy
1.flavorText: The user takes a deep breath and focuses so that critical hits land more easily.
1.effect: Increases the user's chance to score a critical hit.

1.name: Venoshock
1.effect: Inflicts double damage if the target is Poisoned.

1.name: Assurance
1.effect: Power is doubled if the target has already received damage this turn.

1.name: Toxic Spikes
1.effect: Scatters poisoned spikes, poisoning opposing Pokémon that switch in.

1.name: Pin Missile
1.flavorText: Sharp spikes are shot at the target in rapid succession. They hit two to five times in a row.
1.effect: Hits 2-5 times in one turn.

1.name: Poison Jab
1.effect: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.

1.name: Agility
1.flavorText: The user relaxes and lightens its body to move faster. This sharply raises the Speed stat.
1.effect: Raises the user's Speed by two stages.

1.name: Endeavor
1.effect: Lowers the target's HP to equal the user's.

1.name: Fell Stinger
1.effect: Raises the user's Attack by two stages if it KOs the target.

name: Pidgey
flavorText: Pidgey has an extremely sharp sense of direction. It is capable of unerringly returning home to its nest, however far it may be removed from its familiar surroundings.

abilities.name: Keen Eye
abilities.flavorText: Keen eyes prevent other Pokémon from lowering this Pokémon’s accuracy.
abilities.shortEffect: Prevents accuracy from being lowered.
effect: This Pokémon cannot have its accuracy lowered.

This ability does not prevent any accuracy losses other than stat modifiers, such as the accuracy cut from fog; nor does it prevent other Pokémon's evasion from making this Pokémon's moves less accurate.  This Pokémon can still be passed negative accuracy modifiers through heart-swap.
Overworld: If the first Pokémon in the party has this ability, any random encounter with a Pokémon five or more levels lower than it has a 50% chance of being skipped.

abilities.name: Tangled Feet
abilities.flavorText: Raises evasion if the Pokémon is confused.
abilities.shortEffect: Doubles evasion when confused.
effect: When this Pokémon is confused, it has twice its evasion.

abilities.name: Big Pecks
abilities.flavorText: Protects the Pokémon from Defense-lowering effects.
abilities.shortEffect: Protects against Defense drops.
effect: This Pokémon's Defense cannot be lowered by other Pokémon.
This Pokémon can still be passed negative Defense modifiers through heart-swap or guard-swap.

1.name: Tackle
1.flavorText: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.
1.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

1.name: Sand Attack
1.flavorText: Sand is hurled in the target’s face, reducing the target’s accuracy.
1.effect: Lowers the target's accuracy by one stage.

1.name: Gust
1.flavorText: A gust of wind is whipped up by wings and launched at the target to inflict damage.
1.effect: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Pokémon in the air.

1.name: Quick Attack
1.flavorText: The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes it almost invisible. This move always goes first.
1.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

1.name: Whirlwind
1.flavorText: The target is blown away, and a different Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single Pokémon.
1.effect: Immediately ends wild battles.  Forces trainers to switch Pokémon.

1.name: Twister
1.effect: Has a 20% chance to make the target flinch.

1.name: Feather Dance
1.effect: Lowers the target's Attack by two stages.

1.name: Agility
1.flavorText: The user relaxes and lightens its body to move faster. This sharply raises the Speed stat.
1.effect: Raises the user's Speed by two stages.

1.name: Wing Attack
1.flavorText: The target is struck with large, imposing wings spread wide to inflict damage.
1.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

1.name: Roost
1.effect: Heals the user by half its max HP.

1.name: Tailwind
1.effect: For three turns, friendly Pokémon have doubled Speed.

1.name: Mirror Move
1.flavorText: The user counters the target by mimicking the target’s last move.
1.effect: Uses the target's last used move.

1.name: Air Slash
1.effect: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

1.name: Hurricane
1.effect: Has a 30% chance to confuse the target.

name: Pidgeotto
flavorText: Pidgeotto claims a large area as its own territory. This Pokémon flies around, patrolling its living space. If its territory is violated, it shows no mercy in thoroughly punishing the foe with its sharp claws.

name: Pidgeot
flavorText: This Pokémon has a dazzling plumage of beautifully glossy feathers. Many Trainers are captivated by the striking beauty of the feathers on its head, compelling them to choose Pidgeot as their Pokémon.

name: Rattata
flavorText: Its incisors grow continuously throughout its life. If its incisors get too long, this Pokémon becomes unable to eat, and it starves to death.

abilities.name: Run Away
abilities.flavorText: Enables a sure getaway from wild Pokémon.
abilities.shortEffect: Ensures success fleeing from wild battles.
effect: This Pokémon is always successful fleeing from wild battles, even if trapped by a move or ability.

abilities.name: Guts
abilities.flavorText: It’s so gutsy that having a status condition boosts the Pokémon’s Attack stat.
abilities.shortEffect: Increases Attack to 1.5× with a major status ailment.
effect: Whenever this Pokémon is asleep, burned, paralyzed, or poisoned, it has 1.5× its Attack.  This Pokémon is not affected by the usual Attack cut from a burn.
This bonus does not count as a stat modifier.

abilities.name: Hustle
abilities.flavorText: N/A
abilities.shortEffect: Strengthens physical moves to inflict 1.5× damage, but decreases their accuracy to 0.8×.
effect: This Pokémon's physical moves do 1.5× as much regular damage, but have 0.8× their usual accuracy.
Special moves are unaffected.  Moves that do set damage, such as seismic-toss, have their accuracy affected, but not their damage.
Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, higher-levelled Pokémon have their encounter rate increased.

1.name: Assurance
1.effect: Power is doubled if the target has already received damage this turn.

1.name: Crunch
1.effect: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Defense by one stage.

1.name: Sucker Punch
1.effect: Only works if the target is about to use a damaging move.

1.name: Super Fang
1.flavorText: The user chomps hard on the target with its sharp front fangs. This cuts the target’s HP in half.
1.effect: Inflicts damage equal to half the target's HP.

1.name: Double-Edge
1.flavorText: A reckless, life-risking tackle. This also damages the user quite a lot.
1.effect: User receives 1/3 the damage inflicted in recoil.

1.name: Endeavor
1.effect: Lowers the target's HP to equal the user's.

name: Raticate
flavorText: People say that it fled from its enemies by using its small webbed hind feet to swim from island to island in Alola.

1.effect: Increases the user's chance to score a critical hit.

1.name: Quick Attack
1.flavorText: The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes it almost invisible. This move always goes first.
1.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

1.name: Focus Energy
1.flavorText: The user takes a deep breath and focuses so that critical hits land more easily.
1.effect: Increases the user's chance to score a critical hit.

1.name: Bite
1.flavorText: The target is bitten with viciously sharp fangs. This may also make the target flinch.
1.effect: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

1.name: Pursuit
1.effect: Has double power against, and can hit, Pokémon attempting to switch out.

1.name: Hyper Fang
1.flavorText: The user bites hard on the target with its sharp front fangs. This may also make the target flinch.
1.effect: Has a 10% chance to make the target flinch.

1.name: Assurance
1.effect: Power is doubled if the target has already received damage this turn.

1.name: Crunch
1.effect: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Defense by one stage.

1.name: Sucker Punch
1.effect: Only works if the target is about to use a damaging move.

1.name: Super Fang
1.flavorText: The user chomps hard on the target with its sharp front fangs. This cuts the target’s HP in half.
1.effect: Inflicts damage equal to half the target's HP.

1.name: Double-Edge
1.flavorText: A reckless, life-risking tackle. This also damages the user quite a lot.
1.effect: User receives 1/3 the damage inflicted in recoil.

1.name: Endeavor
1.effect: Lowers the target's HP to equal the user's.
